summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of DMM application after Approvals component fix. All critical issues from previous iteration have been resolved. Strategy creation and approval workflow is now fully functional.

Strategy save to backend - API integration successful
Navigation between Strategy and Approvals pages

Strategy approval modal opens and displays content correctly
Approval workflow - Review & Approve button clickable
Approval modal with targeting filters functional
Status updates after approval - items show 'Approved' status
Complete round-trip workflow: Create → Navigate → Approve → Verify (FULLY WORKING)
Multiple strategies display with different statuses (Approved, Pending Approval)
Success message display after strategy creation
